wikipedia_page.main: Nadine Muriel, Countess of Shrewsbury (née Crofton-Atkins;  24 January 1913 – 19 February 2003), known professionally as Nadine Talbot and later as Nadine Credi, was an English opera soprano and the first wife of John Chetwynd-Talbot, 21st Earl of Shrewsbury (1914–1980). They married in 1936.
